Rule_Description: If >40% of category spend is concentrated in a single region
Action_Recommendation: Diversify suppliers across additional regions

Rule_Description: If bottom 20% of spend is distributed across too many suppliers
Action_Recommendation: Consolidate tail suppliers or renegotiate contracts

Rule_Description: If >60% of category spend is with a single supplier
Action_Recommendation: Immediately diversify to reduce dependency

Rule_Description: If contracts expiring within 90 days exceed 30% of spend
Action_Recommendation: Initiate renewal negotiations or find alternatives

Rule_Description: If supplier ESG score is below minimum threshold
Action_Recommendation: Replace with higher ESG suppliers or require improvement plan

Rule_Description: If price variance exceeds threshold in last 6 months
Action_Recommendation: Lock in fixed pricing or hedge commodity risk

Rule_Description: If quality rejection rate exceeds acceptable threshold
Action_Recommendation: Implement quality improvement plan or change supplier

Rule_Description: If on-time delivery rate falls below threshold
Action_Recommendation: Penalize supplier or find more reliable alternative

Rule_Description: If average payment terms are less than industry benchmark
Action_Recommendation: Negotiate extended payment terms for better cash flow

Rule_Description: If supplier has debt-to-equity ratio above threshold
Action_Recommendation: Assess financial risk and consider backup suppliers

Rule_Description: If supplier capacity utilization exceeds threshold
Action_Recommendation: Secure capacity commitments or identify backup suppliers

Rule_Description: If MOQ exceeds 6 months of forecasted demand
Action_Recommendation: Negotiate lower MOQ or find alternative suppliers

Rule_Description: If lead time exceeds industry benchmark by threshold
Action_Recommendation: Negotiate shorter lead times or find faster suppliers

Rule_Description: If >50% of spend is in volatile foreign currency
Action_Recommendation: Implement currency hedging or diversify currency exposure

Rule_Description: If spend with minority/diverse suppliers is below target
Action_Recommendation: Increase diverse supplier participation

Rule_Description: If spend with innovative/R&D suppliers is below target
Action_Recommendation: Partner with innovative suppliers for competitive advantage

Rule_Description: If local content percentage is below regulatory requirement
Action_Recommendation: Increase local supplier participation to meet regulations

Rule_Description: If critical category has only one qualified supplier
Action_Recommendation: Urgently qualify additional suppliers

Rule_Description: If price exceeds market benchmark by threshold
Action_Recommendation: Renegotiate pricing or switch to competitive suppliers

Rule_Description: If supplier response time exceeds acceptable threshold
Action_Recommendation: Set SLA requirements or find more responsive suppliers

Rule_Description: If supplier contract compliance rate falls below threshold
Action_Recommendation: Enforce penalties or terminate non-compliant suppliers

Rule_Description: If inventory turnover ratio is below industry benchmark
Action_Recommendation: Optimize ordering frequency or reduce safety stock

Rule_Description: If Herfindahl index exceeds concentration threshold
Action_Recommendation: Reduce supplier concentration to improve competition

Rule_Description: If >40% of spend is in high geopolitical risk countries
Action_Recommendation: Diversify to politically stable regions

Rule_Description: If supplier cybersecurity rating is below minimum
Action_Recommendation: Require cybersecurity improvements or find secure suppliers

Rule_Description: If suppliers lack required sustainability certifications
Action_Recommendation: Mandate certifications (ISO 14001 RSPO etc)

Rule_Description: If high-risk suppliers not audited within threshold period
Action_Recommendation: Schedule immediate supplier audits

Rule_Description: If contracts lack price escalation protection
Action_Recommendation: Add CPI-indexed escalation clauses to contracts

Rule_Description: If critical categories lack qualified backup suppliers
Action_Recommendation: Qualify and maintain backup suppliers for continuity

Rule_Description: If supplier innovation index is below competitive threshold
Action_Recommendation: Partner with more innovative suppliers

Rule_Description: If category carbon footprint exceeds sustainability target
Action_Recommendation: Switch to lower carbon suppliers or offset emissions

Rule_Description: If suppliers lack ethical sourcing certifications
Action_Recommendation: Mandate ethical certifications (SA8000 Fair Trade)

Rule_Description: If >20 suppliers in category with <2% spend each
Action_Recommendation: Consolidate to reduce administrative overhead

Rule_Description: If strategic categories lack long-term partnerships
Action_Recommendation: Establish long-term strategic partnerships

Rule_Description: If weighted supplier performance score falls below threshold
Action_Recommendation: Implement performance improvement plan or replace
